content: I've been really enjoying "How I Built This" because it's inspiring to hear the stories of entrepreneurs who have built successful companies. Since I started my new job 3 months ago, I've been taking the bus to work instead of driving, which has given me more time to listen to podcasts. I've also been experimenting with different podcast apps, and I recently switched from Apple Podcasts to Spotify because I like the Discover Weekly feature, which recommends new podcasts based on my listening history.
